H0.text: Tanganyika and Zanzibar merged in 1964 to become which East African Republic. United Republic of East Africa

H1.text: Tanganyika and Zanzibar merged in 1964 to become which East African Republic. Tanzanian Federation

H2.text: Tanganyika and Zanzibar merged in 1964 to become which East African Republic. East African Union

H3.text: Tanganyika and Zanzibar merged in 1964 to become which East African Republic. TNZ

A4.text: the new country was then named the United Republic of Tanganyika and Zanzibar

A5.text: the country was renamed the United Republic of Tanzania

A6.text: United Republic of Tanganyika and Zanzibar, the predecessor of Tanzania

A7.text: Zanzibar united with Tanganyika in 1964 to form the present-day United Republic of Tanzania

A8.text: the United Republic of Tanganyika and Zanzibar was soon renamed, blending the two names, as the United Republic of Tanzania
